name: psychologically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 in a way that relates to the human mind and feelings: The patient was psychologically disturbed. The incident damaged her psychologically. The publisher's rejection of my book hit me hard, psychologically and financially. Related word
psychological
More examplesFewer examplesYounger people with Alzheimer's are often aware of their dementia and suffer psychologically as a result. Most psychologically healthy people want to live in a world of stability and peace.We were better prepared psychologically than the other team.Starting a chain of events that will eventually result in a person getting killed, psychologically, is different from killing someone with your own hands.To win a game without him is, psychologically, a big step for the team.We believe people are always developing, psychologically, socially and biologically.
